title.en-US: Thinkcurity: A Media Hub for Security Professionals

summary.en-US: Silvertrac Software needed a better way to reach and educate security businesses. Instead of attending the big industry events, we built our own. Thinkcurity became the go-to content hub for security insights — complete with webinars, blog articles, expert panels, and streaming content.

content.value:
## Background
Silvertrac Software, a tool for security officer management, found that many of its customers — small and mid-sized security companies — couldn't justify the cost of attending major industry conferences. So instead of buying a booth at someone else's show… we became the show.

## Objective
- Establish a thought leadership media platform for the physical security industry
- Create a backend system that allows contributors and copywriters to easily publish content
- Produce and distribute monthly webinars with industry experts
- Build a brand that is educational, professional, and uniquely positioned to own the conversation

## Execution
- HubSpot-powered CMS for publishing articles, videos, and lead-gen offers
- A custom branding system, visual identity, and templates for all webinar & video assets
- Monthly live-streamed webinars, edited into short-form content and on-demand media
- Platform growth across email, social, and SEO channels — all tracked via HubSpot workflows

## Results
- Consistent 4-figure attendance across live webinars
- Increased inbound leads for Silvertrac Software
- Established Thinkcurity as a credible source in a fragmented industry
